title: Resemble
lyrics:
Jib-eulo ganeun gil neowa geol-eul ttaemada
Ne yaegie jakku us-eumman nawa
Sseulsseulhan naldo oeloun naldo
Hangyeolgat-eun geon neowa nanun iyagippun
Adeughan sumanh-eun salamdeul jung neowa na

Geuleohge olaen sigan jinaon gip-eun bam

Amu maldo haji anhneunda haedo



Damdamhan geu manh-eun salamdeul jung neol manna

Daleuge halul sal-agamyeo naneun jeomjeom neol dalm-a



Haluui kkeut-eseo dol-abon neowaui yeohaeng-gil

Daleun sigan-eseo seololeul chaj-aga

Chueog-ui kkeut-eseon majimag han baljagugkkaji

Neoegelo geol-eoganeun gil



Jeo haneul-e modeun geosdeul-eun

Jeonbu da gaggi daleun ileumdeullo bullindae ay

Isanghae bunmyeong nae nun-en jeo tteodanineun ge

Ne eolgulgwa dalm-a boineunde ye

I sesang modeun geos-e uli daehwaga but-eoissneun deus

Neol mannamyeon mannaseo an mannamyeon an mannaseo

Geuliwo teip gam-a naneun neoman dam-a

Ije naega nanji neoinjido gubun-i anga



Adeughan sumanh-eun salamdeul jung neowa na

Geuleohge olaen sigan jinaon gip-eun bam

Amu maldo haji anhneunda haedo

Damdamhan nachseon gilmog-eseo neol manna

Geuleohge daleun gil-eul geol-eogado jeomjeom neol dalm-a



Haluui kkeut-eseo dol-abon neowaui yeohaeng-gil

Daleun sigan-eseo seololeul chaj-aga

Chueog-ui kkeut-eseon majimag han baljagugkkaji

Neoegelo geol-eoganeun gil



Neomu geogjeong mal-a uli jinan halu

Geujeo jinawassdeon gil dasi geol-eogamyeon dwae



Haluui kkeutkkaji neoege gidaeon chueogdeul

Gat-eun sigan sog-e seololeul majuhae

Chueog-ui kkeut-eseon cheoeum geu han geol-eummajeo

Jogeumssig deo jeomjeom neol dalm-a
